helping_mothers: We help refugee mothers access all the help they need
sonder_motto:
We believe you come first, no two mothers' needs are the same, and you should have the power back in your hands.
 We help you set foundations and re-establish those important roots to support both you and your child.
 Sonder provides all the necessities to reopen the door back to experiencing the joys of motherhood and childhood without limitations.
about_blurb: Where refugee mothers are able to obtain necessary items for their children and while in pregnancy.
